column2: Norfolk Southern to ask customers for legal protection against older carsUPDATE 1-Norfolk Southern seeks customer legal protection from older tank cars June 26 Norfolk Southern Corp said it would require its customers to give the railroad company legal protection against damage caused by explosions or leakage of hazardous materials carried in older tank cars. column2: PRESS DIGEST - Wall Street Journal - June 27German parliament cuts ties with Verizon in wake of spying row BERLIN
column3: June 27 Germany's lower house of parliament has joined the government in cutting ties with U.S. telecoms firm Verizon Communications Inc
column4: in reaction to a scandal last year over U.S. government spying and allegations firms were handing over data.  German parliament cuts ties with Verizon in wake of spying row BERLIN

column2: UPDATE 1-INSIGHT-Inspection tensions add to Bangladesh garment industry's woesCanada's top court rules against Wal-Mart in unionization case OTTAWA
column3: June 27 Canada's top court ruled on Friday that Wal-Mart Stores Inc violated Quebec's labor code by closing a store in the largely French-speaking province after an attempt by workers to unionize it.  Canada's top court rules against Wal-Mart in unionization case OTTAWA
